title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1500.2 - Requests for copies
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1500.2 - Requests for copies

State Regulations

Requests for printed material and copies of materials made
available by the Capital District Transportation Authority; Capital District

Transit System, Capital District Transportation District Incorporated; Capital

District Transit System, Number One, Capital District Transportation District

Incorporated and Capital District Transit System, Number Two, Capital District

Transportation District Incorporated (hereinafter referred to as CDTA and
subsidiaries) should be made to: Comptroller

Capital District Transportation Authority
110 Watervliet Avenue

Albany, New York 12206

The comptroller of CDTA and such individuals as designated by
him are the persons from whom such records may be obtained. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1500.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
